mechanosensation.notes: Inferred based on the presence of ciliated cells used for locomotion and the overall body structure. These cells likely provide a basic sense of touch and environmental changes.

chemoreception.notes: Inferred due to their feeding behavior of absorbing food particles (mainly microbes). They must have some way to detect and differentiate these particles.

light_sensitivity.notes: No structures resembling photoreceptors are mentioned. Light sensitivity cannot be ruled out completely.
